name: Link to the dino
description:
Link to the dino

Is a short game about a dino living in the booble search engine, he lives a peacefull live, but one day, something dramatic happends to him, the booble search engine connects to the internet, the dino is doomed, or is he? 

This is a submission to GMTK Game jam 2021

Theme for which was "joined togheter", in my game the dino jump between websites that are joined togheter using links, the game was made in just one day, since i had to scrap my project half way through the jam.

Music used:

Evan king - Error,among,evil,intel,smacks

Michał Górniewicz- Mixed guns Teaser theme/Jungle theme

Check out my upcoming game
